channel.title: Generative music and sound thread
channel.description:
Hi people, I'm into using rules combined with randomness to generate music generally and that is what I am using my axo for so I thought I'd make a thread on here for discussion of generative music generally and also about how to do it with axo alone or by using axo as part of a bigger system.
Any users out there that are also doing generative stuff, either more tonal stuff like I'm into, or just random noise, whatever floats your boat, let's exchange ideas and information.
Post your ideas, comments and example patches, or anything else related to generative music here.

item.title: Generative music and sound thread
item.dc:creator: @strum
item.description:
@strum wrote:

Hi people, I'm into using rules combined with randomness to generate music generally and that is what I am using my axo for so I thought I'd make a thread on here for discussion of generative music generally and also about how to do it with axo alone or by using axo as part of a bigger system.

Any users out there that are also doing generative stuff, either more tonal stuff like I'm into, or just random noise, whatever floats your boat, let's exchange ideas and information.

Post your ideas, comments and example patches, or anything else related to generative music here.
